## Checklist
* [ ] Layer boundaries respected
* [ ] No api returns persistence entities
* [ ] Success path tests added or updated
* [ ] Failure path tests added or updated
* [ ] Error contract unchanged or updated intentionally
* [ ] Audit events added or updated when security relevant
* [ ] Migrations included for schema changes
* [ ] No TODO left behind
